SEARCH
Package com.game.core.strategies

Class DoubleShootStrategy

java.lang.Object
com.game.core.strategies.DoubleShootStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
ShootingStrategy
public class DoubleShootStrategy extends Object implements ShootingStrategy
A shooting strategy that fires two bullets at once when the shoot method is invoked. This strategy uses a predefined bullet configuration to create each bullet.

      Fires two bullets of the specified BulletType, using the given Player as the owner.
